column1: You are given a dataset on customer churn. How would you approach this data to identify factors contributing to churn?
A business leader asks you to build a model to predict sales. How would you explain the trade-offs between model accuracy and interpretability?
You encounter a large imbalanced dataset in your analysis. How would you approach this challenge?
Describe your thought process for building a machine learning pipeline for a specific problem.
Explain how you would communicate complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
You are presented with a messy and unstructured dataset. How would you begin cleaning and preparing this data for analysis?
Describe a situation where you had to troubleshoot an issue with your machine learning model.
How do you stay updated on the latest advancements in data science and machine learning?
Discuss your experience with working on data science projects in a collaborative environment.
Do you have any questions for us about the data science role at Deloitte?
